name: Echoes of Etrya
description:
Echoes of Etrya is an upcoming third person 3D time puzzle  game in which the player solves puzzles in an ancient temple by recording their actions for a copy of themselves to repeat those actions.

The plot is about a girl who is on a quest to fix the gears of time, a powerful mechanism which her ancestors built a temple around to channel it’s energy leading to time anomalies. With a mystical armband she received from her ancestors she is the only one who can restore balance to the world.

For concepts, development insights, and more visit us on facebook. (coming soon)

Release Date: March 08. 2018

This is a 3rd semester project at the S4G School for Games GmbH by it's students.
